title: Salesforce | SMTS | Bengaluru
content:
Education: BTech in Tier 1
Years of Experience: 5+
Prior Experience: Oracle
Previous CTC: 55 LPA (Mostly stocks)
Date of the Offer: Oct 2023
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Bangaluru, India

Salary: 48,00,000
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1,00,000
Stock bonus: $95,000 (~79L for 4 years, 19.75L per year)
Bonus: Performance bonus up to 15% of base ~7.2L

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 76L 
48L (Base) + 19.75L (RSU) + 7.2L (Performance Bonus) + 1L (Sign-On)

Benefits: https://salesforcebenefits.com/
Other details: 
Applied from the careers page. The whole interview process finished in a week including the OA and 3 rounds of interviews. Got the verbal confirmation 1 week later that I'm selected. 2 weeks later I got the offer letter.

The interview was on-site (Bengaluru Salesforce office) and was a great experience. The interviewers were really friendly. The hiring manager was a people person. The food was great.

Interview Experience: https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/4205025/Salesforce-or-SMTS-or-Bengaluru-or-Oct-2023-Offer
